Nexode 300W 5-Port PD GaN Fast Charger

High Compatibility

More Power on the Table

Ugreen has unveiled the world's first 300-watt 5-Port GaN charger, equipped with a dedicated 140-watt output port. Designed with multi-device charging in mind, users will experience mind-blowingly fast charge speeds, make connecting and powering multiple laptops simultaneously a possibility, and eliminate the need for individual chargers for each device.

One Charger....

Saving Time & Effort

Spend more time focused on what's needed and less time charging with FIVE fast charging ports (4 USB-C, 1 USB-A)! With support for all major fast charging protocols, including PD/QC/SCP/FCA/AFC super charge your devices fast so you can get charged and get to the day! Compatible with smartphones, tablet, laptops and other devices, coupled with Ugreen's proprietaryintelligent Power Distribution System, the Nexode 300W accurately outputs the correct amount of current to connected devices, providing a conventional fast charge without damage to battery longevity. All this culminates in the ability for users to charge a 16-inch MacBook Pro to 56% in 30 minutes.

Safety You Can Trust

A built-in Thermal Guard™ systemprovides first-class safety; monitoring temperature changes in real-time and taking 6000 temperature readings each minute. This system keeps your connected devices safe from overheat, overcharge, and excessive current. A solid, first-rate fire-resistant and flame-retardant PVC shell provides additional fire defense and resistance to bumps and drops.

Powerful, Clean & Green GaN

By switching from older, legacy Silicon to GaN powered integrated circuits, the piece in the Nexode family effectively reduces carbon emissions by up to 30 percent and is estimated to remove an estimated 2.0 Gtons of CO2 by 2050.*

*Data obtained from Navitas Semiconductor
